place_info.title: Radiance Dental Hospital - Turismo Dentale in Albania

reviews.name: Besnik Dalliu
reviews.comment: Very good servis dhe friendly staff. I appreciate the staff's dedication when i was there. Very good dental clinic.

reviews.name: Enian Tafa
reviews.comment:
Very professional and skilled. Every person I met in their office was courteous friendly and professional.
Cannot recommend them more highly.

reviews.comment: It was the best clinic I found around, the prices were affordable and the service was ten out of ten üôÇ

reviews.comment:
Fantastic service and a friendly team
The cheapest prices and the best quality üëå üëè

reviews.name: Luciana Siddi
reviews.comment:
I am really happy I chose this dental clinic! The environment is modern, clean and welcoming, and all the staff are extremely professional and kind. I immediately felt at ease, which is not at all a given when talking about a dentist!
The doctor explained each step with clarity and patience, answering all my questions. The treatment was quick, painless and with an impeccable result.
Post-intervention was also followed with great attention.
I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for a serious, reliable service with a human touch. I couldn't be more satisfied!

reviews.name: Bruno Serra
reviews.comment: I found this clinic after some research, I felt very comfortable, professional, welcoming staff, lots of nice things. I thank consultant Irena and coordinator Olsi who convinced me to get my teeth done because I was scared and skeptical.  I would like to thank surgeons Loreta and kleida and doctor Kristo. Thank you radiance dental hospital
